## `rap`

The files for the `rhino` app are below:

```{r}
#| eval: true
#| echo: true 
fs::dir_tree("_apps/rap", recurse = 0)
```

## `rhino` package dependencies 

`rhino` uses [`box`](https://klmr.me/box/), which has the explicit goal of '*completely replac[ing] the base R `library` and `require` functions.*'

```{r}
#| eval: true 
#| include: true
#| code-fold: show 
#| code-summary: 'show/hide rhino dependency tree'
library(rhino)
pak::pkg_deps_tree(pkg = "rhino")
```

### `rap` dependencies 

`rhino` apps aren't packages, so the dependencies are stored in `rap/dependencies.R`

```{r}
#| eval: true
#| code-fold: true 
#| code-summary: 'show/hide rap dependency tree'
#| collapse: true 
#| comment: "\t"
readLines(con = "_apps/rap/dependencies.R")
```
